name: FreezeFrame
author: Eric van Fandenfart
description:
Creates a Freeze Frame locally of avatars in a world by creating a copy of each avatar. The avatar is in the state the Freeze Frame was activated. Freeze Frames can be stacked and all Freeze Frames can be deleted afterward.
The buttons to create an delete Freeze Frames are found in the action menu and on the player quick menu
Its also possible to record animations and play them back afterwards

 With [VRCWS](https://github.com/Er1807/VRCWS) the event of taking a freeze is synchronized between all members in the lobby that also have VRCWS and FreezeFrame and are connected to the same VRCWS server
changelog:
Rebuild for 2201
 Added SkipFrame config option to make recordings a bit smoother
